self_reported_context.main_struggles: Sensory overload in supermarkets. Bright lights, loud beeps, crowds cause distress. Words become hard to process.
self_reported_context.helpful_strategies: Earphones, colour hunt, TIPP temperature, Butterfly Hug, short sentences
self_reported_context.additional_notes: Autistic teen. Needs ultra-short sentences, concrete choices, minimal text during overload.

sensory_profile.sensitivity_notes: Sensitive to bright lights, loud beeps, crowds. Prefers text, short sentences.

neurodivergence.communication_notes: Ultra-short sentences. Concrete choices. Minimal text during overload. OK with emojis.
